title: JG Exp Nerf
body: The JG exp Nerf is too much.  Prior to today's patch, I would get lvl 6 off my 2nd Red.  Now, I am getting level 4 off my 2nd Red.  And that is with me securing 2/3 Scuddles.  I am constantly 2 levels behind my teammates until I get about lvl 8.

replies.body: It's time to tax your laners' wave everytime you're done ganking for them.
